sources.title: PimpernelSmithVideoQualityUpgrade
sources.description: This glitch-free print is sharper than the low-resolution copy in this collection. Leslie Howard again has the title role in this seriocomic world war 2 updating of the classic adventure yarn of the napoleonic wars, "The Scarlet Pimpernel." Directed by Leslie Howard UK release 1941 US release 1942 a.k.a. "The Fighting Pimpernel" & "Mr V" (US) Complete print NOTE: "The Scarlet Pimpernel" and its direct sequel, "Return of the Scarlet Pimpernel," are also available here at IA in the Feature Films Collection.
